headline.main: Life in Red Army a Pipe for Karelian Cat; Quick-Thinking Hanger-On Made a Mascot

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Aug. 24 -- The Russian humorous paper Krokodil tells the following story about a Karelian cat that became a regimental mascot.
abstract: Incident of Karelian cat aiding USSR Army unit described; cat made unit mascot
snippet: MOSCOW, Aug. 24 -- The Russian humorous paper Krokodil tells the following story about a Karelian cat that became a regimental mascot....

byline.original: By Air Mail to THE NEW YORK TIMES
